Personal O
data O
kit O
Softwares O
: O

a O

- O
function O
phone O

in O
android O
. O
Anyone O

for O

. O

on O
this O
mobile O
, O
it O

number O
and O

whether O

the O
numbers O

saved O
in O

database O
. O

is O

on O

screen O
. O

on O
this O
mobile O

name O

contact O

. O

an O

component O
. O
Our O

tracker O
at O

on O

. O

Health O

. O
Babel O
makes O

September O
2015 O
to O
Present O



easier O

. O
Babel O
s O

of O
a O
Data O
Management O
and O
Information O
System O

( O
DMIS O
) O
support O
to O
the O
Monitoring O
and O
Evaluation O
Unit O
under O
the O
Ministry O
of O
Health O
and O
Family O

Welfare O
( O
MOHFW O
) O
of O
Government O
of O
Bangladesh O
( O
GoB O
) O
. O
The O
project O
was O
launched O
to O
overcome O
the O

lack O
of O
information O
at O
management O
level O
mainly O
due O
to O
a O
fragmentation O
of O
data O
collection O
systems O
. O

The O
key O
approach O
of O
the O
DMIS O
was O
to O
integrate O
the O
main O
data O
sources O
in O
a O
centrally O
managed O

database O
( O
data O
warehouse O
) O
, O
bringing O
together O
data O
from O
different O
sources O
and O
places O
in O
order O
to O

make O
them O
accessible O
and O
available O
to O
enhance O
evidence O
- O
based O
decision O
making O
. O

Responsible O
to O
provide O
a O
practical O
and O
robust O
solution O
for O
the O
integration O
and O
utilization O
of O
data O
and O

information O
at O
national O
level O
, O
for O
policy O
and O
operational O
purposes O
, O
and O
to O
establish O
feedback O

mechanisms O
for O
national O
and O
sub O
- O
national O
Management O
Information O
Systems O
( O
MISs O
) O
. O

The O
major O
outcome O
of O
the O
DMIS O
project O
was O
a O
functional O
composite O
database O
( O
data O
warehouse O
) O
that O

was O
able O
to O
generate O
reports O
and O
answers O
questions O
/ O
queries O
. O
The O
selection O
of O
queries O
were O
based O
on O

already O
defined O
priority O
areas O
and O
key O
indicators O
for O
the O
Health O
Nutrition O
and O
Population O
Sector O

Program O
( O
HNPSP O
) O
monitoring O
and O
management O
. O

Responsible O
for O
design O
a O
data O
warehouse O
to O
absorb O
information O
from O
already O
existing O
data O
providers O

and O
Management O
Information O
Systems O
( O
MISs O
) O
, O
without O
interfering O
in O
their O
data O
collection O
and O

publication O
routine O
to O
enable O
the O
Ministry O
of O
Health O
and O
Family O
Welfare O
to O
monitor O
indicators O
and O
to O

evaluate O
trends O
and O
achievements O
of O
key O
health O
sector O
programs O
and O
operational O
plans O
of O
different O

directorates O
thus O
providing O
information O
for O
evidence O
- O
based O
decision O
making O
. O
The O
database O
also O
had O

built O
in O
mechanisms O
for O
quality O
checks O
, O
but O
equally O
important O
would O
be O
the O
analysis O
of O
avoidable O

errors O
, O
parallel O
recordings O
, O
and O
other O
problems O
in O
the O
generation O
of O
routine O
data O
. O

Responsible O
for O
design O
and O
develop O
a O
data O
warehouse O
model O
which O
includes O
advanced O
functions O
of O
a O

relational O
database O
and O
a O
potential O
OLAP O
( O
Online O
Analytical O
Processing O
) O
functionality O
. O
Such O
a O
system O

would O
be O
able O
to O
select O
the O
necessary O
data O
from O
complete O
datasets O
and O
to O
modulate O
robust O
data O

combinations O
that O
compensate O
for O
the O
limited O
availability O
of O
quality O
routine O
data O
to O
a O
high O
degree O
. O

The O
system O
was O
easily O
adapted O
to O
the O
integration O
of O
new O
data O
sets O
and O
new O
requirements O
for O

information O
and O
indicators O
. O

Developed O
criteria O
to O
recognize O
correctness O
of O
the O
data O
( O
e.g. O
consistency O
check O
, O
identify O
potential O

sources O
for O
double O
reporting O
) O
. O

Responsible O
for O
design O
a O
Management O
Information O
System O
( O
MIS O
) O
maintenance O
scheme O
. O

Responsible O
for O
Project O
management O
with O
preparing O
regular O
reports O
, O
preparing O
the O

organization O
/ O

of O

, O
monitoring O
and O
documenting O
work O
progress O
, O
planning O

and O
supporting O
project O
- O
related O
research O
. O

Software O
Projects O



TTRF2 O
Site O
Manager O

TTRF2 O
Project O
details O
: O


The O
client O
has O
developed O
an O
RF O
- O
based O
sensor O
network O
. O
They O
need O
to O
implement O
advanced O

new O
features O
regarding O
security O
and O
RF O
protocol O
implementation O
. O


The O
client O
uses O
an O
RF O
- O
based O
sensor O
network O
to O
monitor O
the O
temperature O
of O
several O

temperature O
- O
sensitive O
products O
. O
The O
network O
comprises O
of O
three O
embedded O
components O

called O
Gateway O
, O
Repeater O
and O
Monitor O
( O
Temperature O
Data O
Logger O
) O
. O


Page O
2 O
of O
5 O



The O
Monitor O
is O
used O
to O
log O
the O
temperature O
of O
the O
temperature O
sensitive O
products O
. O
The O

Gateway O
and O
Repeater O
are O
used O
to O
create O
an O
RF O
sensor O
network O
to O
collect O
and O
log O
the O
data O

wirelessly O
. O
The O
Gateway O
contains O
embedded O
PC O
in O
it O
. O
It O
sends O
the O
logged O
temperature O
data O

automatically O
to O
a O
remote O
web O
server O
downloading O
data O
from O
Monitors O
through O
RF O

network O
. O
It O
also O
gets O
configurations O
, O
rules O
for O
monitors O
from O
specific O
server O
and O
applies O

those O
configurations O
, O
rules O
on O
monitors O
through O
RF O
network O
. O


Through O
TTRF2 O
Site O
Manager O
Application O
specialists O
can O
set O
, O
view O
these O
rules O
, O

configurations O
, O
Data O
Transporter O
settings O
, O
Gateway O
configurations O
, O
site O
, O
user O
settings O
, O
audit O

logs O
etc O
. O


Dev O
Tool O
: O
ASP.NET O
MVC O
5 O
, O
C O
# O
, O
JQuery O


TTRF2 O
Rule O
Manager O
( O
Windows O
Service O
) O

In O
Gateway O
PC O
some O
windows O
services O
run O
to O
communicate O
through O
the O
RF O
network O
. O
One O

of O
them O
is O
Rule O
manager O
that O
polls O
for O
update O
in O
rules O
for O
monitors O
on O
server O
and O
sends O

those O
rules O
as O
commands O
to O
monitors O
and O
also O
downloads O
the O
logged O
data O
from O
monitor O

through O
the O
RF O
network O
. O


Dev O
Tool O
: O
C O
# O

( O

of O

) O

Project O
: O
Social O
Maps O

URL O
: O
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/socialmaps/id562840613?mt=8 O

Project O
details O
: O
Socialmaps O
is O
a O
location O
based O
social O
network O
that O
let O
's O
user O
communicate O

with O
friends O
and O
meet O
new O
people O
in O
user O
surroundings O
. O
User O
can O
see O
nearby O
people O
, O
places O

and O
events O
on O
map O
. O
User O
can O
send O
friends O
request O
to O
other O
user O
and O
can O
also O
send O
friend O

request O
to O
them O
. O
User O
can O
send O
message O
to O
other O
friends O
. O
User O
can O
view O
profile O
of O
other O

users O
. O
User O
can O
also O
view O
nearby O
place O
at O
map O
in O
which O
user O
can O
create O
plan O
, O
event O
, O
meet O
up O

request O
. O
User O
can O
also O
save O
this O
place O
, O
save O
review O
and O
get O
direction O
to O
the O
place O
. O
User O
can O

also O
view O
people O
list O
, O
saved O
places O
, O
friend O
list O
, O
messages O
, O
newsfeed O
, O
profile O
and O
settings O

panel O
. O
User O
can O
share O
location O
with O
all O
users O
, O
friends O
only O
or O
no O
one O
. O
User O
can O
share O
photo O
, O

geo O
- O
tags O
and O
also O
can O
get O
direction O
to O
any O
place O
. O
User O
will O

about O
nearby O

friends O
, O
meet O
up O
request O
, O
events O
or O
messages O
. O

	 O
Undergraduate O
Thesis O
	 O

	 O
An O
approach O
to O
remove O
cycling O
in O
simplex O
method O
. O
Normally O
cycling O
occurs O
because O
of O
degenerate O
vertex O
of O
the O
Polytope O
. O
In O
this O
approach O
a O
new O
plane O
is O
added O
in O
such O
a O
way O
the O
degenerate O
vertex O
is O
cut O
and O
some O
non O
- O
degenerate O
vertices O
are O
made O
. O

Out O

is O

for O

. O

	 O
Mentor O
Fresher O
s O

process O

. O

	 O
Project O
Description O
: O

	 O
This O
is O
an O
in O
- O
vehicle O
Infotainment O
& O
connectivity O
project O
which O
includes O
Vehicle O
applications O
like O
RVC O
( O
rear O
view O
camera O
) O
, O
climate O
control O
& O
Trailering O
App O
.Also O
it O
includes O
Multimedia O
app O
like O
phone O
, O
Wi O
- O
Fi O
& O
Music O
. O

	 O
Module O
HMI O
developed O
using O
Altia O
Design O
Each O
HMI O
application O
contains O
Screen O
Manager O
to O
create O
screens O
and O
contains O
Logic O
Manager O
to O
read O
the O
data O
from O
Data O
Manager O
and O
middle O
- O
ware O
. O

	 O
The O
HMI O
application O
is O
composed O
as O
follows O
. O
Middle O
- O
ware O
runs O
in O
separate O
process O
. O
The O
communication O
between O
Middle O
- O
ware O
and O
HMI O
application O
( O
HMI O
Business O
Logic O
) O
takes O
place O
through O
dbus O
communication O
. O
And O
Infotainment O
Applications O
are O
developed O
and O
displayed O
on O
Home O
Screen O
. O

# O

Corp. O

About O
Project O
: O

This O
is O
used O
on O
car O
dashboard O
as O
an O
Infotainment O
set O
up O
, O
which O
includes O
multimedia O
, O
email O
, O
sms O
, O
contact O
book O
, O
usb O
and O
ipod O
connectivity O
features O
along O
with O
Vehicle O
features O
like O
Parking O
Assistance O
, O
Blind O
Spot O
Detection O
and O
Climate O
Control O
. O

The O
Messaging O
module O
is O
responsible O
for O
downloading O
, O
displaying O
and O
sending O
messages O
from O
a O
connected O
BT O
device O
supporting O
the O
MAP O
profile O
. O
The O
messages O
can O
either O
be O
newly O
created O
using O
the O
Messaging O
Application O
HMI O
or O
can O
be O
one O
of O
the O
system O
or O
user O
pre O
- O
defined O
template O
messages O
. O
The O
Messaging O
Services O
is O
responsible O
for O
translating O
requests O
between O
the O
Messaging O
Application O
Logic O
and O
the O
middleware O
Messaging O
Core O
component O
. O
Messages O
created O
/ O
edited O
in O
the O
Application O
Logic O
are O
sent O
using O
the O
Messaging O
Services O
. O

While O
the O
interfacing O
of O
sensors O
and O
device O
drivers O
was O
done O
by O
Client O
, O
KPIT O
team O
was O
involved O
with O
retrieving O
the O
required O
data O
from O
the O
Sensor O
framework O
and O
displaying O
on O
HMI O
. O
The O
look O
and O
feel O
of O
the O
HMI O
was O
defined O
by O
the O
Client O
. O

Timesheet O
Rounding O
: O

Provide O
user O
friendly O
solution O
to O
Staffing O
and O
Recruiting O
Industry O
to O
enhance O
business O

we O
implemented O
Timesheet O
Rounding O
. O
If O
you O
re O
rounding O
time O
to O
the O
nearest O
15-minute O
increment O
, O
we O
will O
round O
20 O
minutes O
down O
to O
15 O
or O
25 O
minutes O
up O
to O
30 O
. O
Alternatively O
, O
if O
rounding O
up O
to O
the O
nearest O
15-minute O
increment O
, O
both O
time O
entries O
of O
20 O
& O
25 O
minutes O
would O
be O
rounded O
up O
to O
30 O
. O

. O

is O

car O

is O

for O

, O

from O
a O

BT O

system O

- O

template O

. O

is O

for O

requests O

Messaging O
Application O
Logic O
and O

the O
middleware O

Core O
component O
. O
Messages O
created O
/ O

in O
the O

Application O
Logic O
are O
sent O
using O
the O
Messaging O
Services O
. O

	 O

abstract O

Research O

: O

Title O

Transcription O
Problems O
in O
Bangla O
Language O

Conference O
: O

of O

American O
Chapter O
of O
the O
Association O

for O

Linguistics O
: O
Human O
Language O
Technologies O

( O

- O
NAACL O
) O
[ O
h5-index O
: O
56 O
] O

: O
Grapheme O
to O
phoneme O
( O
G2P O
) O
conversion O
is O
an O
integral O
part O
of O

various O
text O
and O
speech O
processing O
systems O
, O
such O
as O
Text O
to O

Speech O
system O
, O
Speech O
Recognition O
system O
, O
etc O
. O
The O
existing O

methodologies O
for O
G2P O
conversion O
in O
Bangla O
language O
are O

mostly O
rule O
- O
based O
. O
However O
, O
data O
- O
driven O
approaches O
have O

proved O
their O
superiority O
over O
rule O
- O
based O
approaches O
for O
large- O

scale O
G2P O
conversion O
in O
other O
languages O
, O
such O
as O
English O
, O

German O
, O
etc O
. O
As O
the O
performance O
of O
data O
- O
driven O
approaches O
for O

Desktop O
Applications O
: O

G2P O
conversion O
depend O
largely O
on O
pronunciation O
lexicon O
on O

which O
the O
system O
is O
trained O
, O
in O
this O
paper O
, O
we O
investigate O
on O

developing O
an O
improved O
training O
lexicon O
by O
identifying O
and O

categorizing O
the O
critical O
cases O
in O
Bangla O
language O
and O
include O

those O
critical O
cases O
in O
training O
lexicon O
for O
developing O
a O
robust O

G2P O
conversion O
system O
in O
Bangla O
language O
. O
Additionally O
, O
we O

have O
incorporated O
nasal O
vowels O
in O
our O
proposed O
phoneme O
list O
. O

Our O
methodology O
outperforms O
other O
state O
- O
of O
- O
the O
- O
art O
approaches O

for O
G2P O
conversion O
in O
Bangla O
language O
. O

application O

and O

to O

and O

Created O

to O
test O
, O

files O
to O
compare O
data O

and O

of O

and O

exact O
outcomes O
or O

. O

This O

is O
having O
62 O
sheets O
, O
which O

to O

compared O
with O
another O

62 O
sheets O
which O

too O

to O

. O

. O

Projects O
: O





Kona O
Pay O
- O
PaaS(Wallet O
) O

Kona O
Pay- O
PaaS O
is O
a O
platform O
as O
a O
service O
type O
product O
. O
Through O
this O
platform O
an O
issuer O
( O
Bank O
) O
will O
be O
able O
to O

issue O
card O
, O
A O
Merchant O
will O
be O
able O
to O
sell O
his O
product O
and O
a O
cardholder O
will O
be O
able O
to O
easily O
personalize O
and O
pay O

the O
payment O
by O
his O
/ O
her O
mobile O
. O

Used O
Technologies O
are O
Java O
, O
Spring O
, O
Hibernate O
, O
Gradle O
, O
REST O
, O
Git O
, O
Oracle O
, O
Wildfly O
. O

K O
- O
CPS O
( O
KONA O
Card O
Personalization O
System O
) O

Card O
personalization O
is O
the O
most O
important O
part O
to O
issue O
an O
EMV(EuroPay O
, O
Master O
, O
Visa O
) O
compliant O

ICC(Integrated O
Circuit O
Card O
) O
to O
end O
user O
. O
Very O
few O
company O
provides O
the O
solution O
of O
personalization O
system O
. O

K O
- O
CPS O
is O
a O
complete O
web O
solution O
to O
personalize O
ICC O
with O
the O
data O
provided O
by O
Bank O
. O

Used O
Technologies O
are O
Java O
, O
maven O
, O
Spring O
, O
MyBatis O
, O
MySQL O
. O

K O
- O
KMS O
( O
KONA O
Key O
Management O
System O
) O

During O
ICC O
personalization O
and O
transaction O
there O
need O
to O
manage O
various O
keys O
and O
Certificates O
. O
Those O
Keys O

and O
Certificates O
are O
needed O
to O
store O
and O
manage O
securely O
. O
K O
- O
KMS O
is O
used O
to O
store O
and O
manage O
the O
Keys O
and O

Certificates O
securely O
. O

Used O
Technologies O
are O
Java O
, O
maven O
, O
Spring O
, O
MyBatis O
, O
MySQL O
. O

K O
- O
PAS O
( O
KONA O
Profile O
Automation O
System O
) O

According O
to O
GP O
( O
Global O
Platform O
) O
specification O
to O
personalize O
a O
card O
there O
need O
profiles O
in O
CPS(Card O

Personalization O
System O
) O
. O
Those O
profiles O
are O
written O
according O
to O
the O
specification O
specified O
by O
GP O
. O
K O
- O
PAS O

( O
Kona O
Profile O
Automation O
System O
) O
is O
used O
to O
generate O
a O
set O
of O
profiles O
automatically O
from O
some O
data O
specified O

by O
Issuer(Bank O
) O
and O
applet O
provider O
. O

Used O
Technologies O
are O
Java O
, O
maven O
. O

K O
- O
IIS O
( O
KONA O
Instant O
Issuance O
System O
) O

Kona O
Instant O
Issuance O
System O
is O
also O
called O
as O
branch O
issuance O
system O
. O
The O
purpose O
of O
the O
K O
- O
IIS O
is O
to O

personalize O
a O
card O
to O
issue O
to O
a O
customer O
/ O
client O
instantly O
in O
branch O
office O
, O
without O
sending O
personalization O

request O
to O
corporate O
office O
. O

Used O
Technologies O
are O
Java O
, O
maven O
. O

XBRL O
( O
eXtensible O
Business O
Reporting O
Language O
) O

This O
is O
a O
tool O
for O
filing O
Agents O
to O
submit O
XBRL O
reports O
to O
SEC O
, O
USA O
. O
XpressBRL O
allows O
to O
instantly O
map O
line O

items O
and O
block O
tag O
notes O
to O
elements O
within O
an O
imported O
company O
taxonomy O
. O
It O
has O
unique O
editing O
tools O
to O

provide O
user O
friendly O
methods O
to O
create O
parenthetical O
data O
, O
apply O
footnotes O
, O
validate O
and O
proof O
XBRL O
instance O

files O
. O

Used O
Technologies O
are O
Java O
, O
PostgreSQL O
. O

DOCX2HTM O

Typically O
company O
prepares O
their O
document O
using O
microsoft O
office O
tool O
. O
But O
to O
prepare O
XBRL O
report O
there O
need O

htm O
/ O
html O
file O
. O
So O
there O
need O
to O
convert O
microsoft O
office O
word O
( O
.doc/.docx O
) O
file O
into O
html O
file O
. O
DOCX2HTM O
is O

a O
tool O
for O
converting O
doc O
/ O
docx O
file O
into O
html O
file O
. O
Using O
this O
tool O
user O
can O
convert O
a O
doc O
/ O
docx O
file O
into O
html O
file O

within O
a O
short O
time O
perfectly O
. O

Used O
Technologies O
are O
flex O
, O
Java O
. O

































PDF2HTM O
( O
pdf O
to O
html O
) O

This O
is O
a O
tool O
for O
converting O
pdf O
into O
html O
file O
. O
Sometimes O
user O
create O
reports O
in O
Office O
document O
in O
a O
complex O

way O
. O
Then O
it O
is O
difficult O
to O
convert O
a O
office O
document O
into O
html O
file O
with O
docx2htm O
project O
. O
Then O
filling O
agent O

use O
this O
tool O
to O
convert O
doc O
/ O
docx O
file O
into O
pdf O
and O
then O
pdf O
to O
html O
. O

Used O
Technologies O
are O
flex O
, O
Java O
. O

Research O

01 O
. O
Integrated O
Common O
Platform O
for O
Managing O
Multiple O
Cloud O
Platform O

Overview O
: O
Cloud O
computing O
emerged O
and O
acquired O
huge O
popularity O
. O
Many O
Cloud O
Service O

Providers O
( O
CSPs O
) O
like O
, O
AWS O
, O
Rackspace O
, O
Azure O
and O
many O
more O
are O
facilitating O
clients O
with O

common O
services O
( O
storage O
, O
computing O
, O
networking O
, O
etc O
. O
) O
and O
thriving O
for O
more O
client O
by O
adding O

new O
features O
. O
So O
, O
Cloud O
Consumer O
( O
CC O
) O
falls O
under O
critical O
situation O
to O
adapt O
new O
API O
and O
quickly O

switch O
to O
CSP O
that O
best O
suits O
their O
business O
requirement O
. O
To O
solve O
this O
perplexity O
of O
CC O
, O
we O

introduce O
a O
prototype O
which O
integrates O
different O
Cloud O
API O
to O
an O
abstract O
API O
platform O
and O

developed O
a O
Proof O
of O
concept O
( O
PoC O
) O
for O
our O
platform O
. O
Using O
our O
single O
point O
API O
CC O
can O
quickly O

switch O
and O
get O
facilitated O
with O
the O
services O
of O
different O
CSP O
without O
individual O
API O
knowledge O

Purpose O
: O
Undergrad O
Thesis O
Research O
. O

Project O
URL O
: O
http://universalapi.codeplex.com O

Technology O
: O
JavaEE O
, O
Java O
Jersey O
, O
Jax O
- O
RS O
, O
Eucalyptus(AWS O
) O
, O
OpenStack O
